name: m.call.answer
description: This event is sent by the callee when they wish to answer the call.

content.name: call_id
content.description: The ID of the call this event relates to.

content.name: version
content.description: The version of the VoIP specification this messages adheres to. This specification is version 0.

Answer.name: sdp
Answer.description: The SDP text of the session description.
